sentences: He made a name for himself in the underground circuit in Jamaica and on the streets of Brooklyn, New York under the personas of Rankin Don
Wayne Rhoden was born in Jamaica to Joyce and James Rhoden and grew up in Brooklyn, New York.
In the 1980s as Rankin Don he recorded the hits
In the 2000s as Father Goose he was featured on several Dan Zanes albums such as Rocket Ship Beach and Catch That Train!
In 2008 as Don Chibaka he gave his performance on the Etcetera single Dance Like That (Remix) featuring Richie Stephens and Kevin Lyttle.
He lives in Brooklyn with his wife and his son (Little Goose) who also sings and performs in his father's band.
In 2007, Rhoden discovered he had kidney failure.
He received a kidney in December 2015 after eight years on dialysis, twice on life support and other complications.
The kidney transplant was successful: he has made a full recovery and is currently still performing and hosting music workshops for children.
